@bentheoandrews @farmers_against @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil ... the landowners. However permission needs to be sought from Natural England. And flood alleviation works such as is suggested these are are not exempt when within 200m of an SSSI. This is all readily available information.

@bentheoandrews @farmers_against @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil I find it puzzling how the farming community are failing to understand the differences between ‚Äúhaving responsibility for‚Äù and ‚Äúhaving permission to‚Äù. It makes me seriously concerned for any SAM in an agricultural setting. The responsibility for the management of any SSSI is 1/2

text: @richwilliams771 @EnvAgencyAnglia Any progress on this with @EnvAgencyAnglia? Would be interested to know how this turns out...

@DobbyWoods @CRTBoating @thisisyourriver @CanalRiverTrust Hi Dobby, the team has just confirmed that the weir is not ours but @EnvAgency should be able to assist. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help with. Best wishes, Clara
